      • setUpNote

        @RequestMapping(value="/note",
                method=GET)
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView setUpNote(@ModelAttribute(value="noteId")
                                                                                                                         java.lang.String id,
                                                                                                                         @ModelAttribute(value="userClass")
                                                                                                                         User u)
        Set up note page
        Parameters:
        id - String database id of the note
        u - User object of the user accessing this note
        Returns:
        ModelAndView of this page with the proper data added

public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView updateNote(@ModelAttribute(value="noteModel")
                                                                                                NoteChange formNote,
                                                                                                @ModelAttribute(value="userClass")
                                                                                                User u)
        Write changes to the note to the database
        Parameters:
        formNote - NoteChange object to store the edits made to the note
        u - User class of user viewing the note
        Returns:
        ModelAndView back to the note page

public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView deleteNote(@ModelAttribute(value="noteId")
                                                                                                    java.lang.String noteId)

        Parameters:
